hero.title: Hi, I'm Aleksey
hero.descr:
Front-end developer with commercial experience in building web applications. I am passionate about programming and optimizing user interfaces using modern technologies and frameworks such as Typescript, Next.JS, React and Tailwind CSS.

I am currently actively looking for a job. I hope that my candidacy will interest you and that I can contribute to your team. I am open to discussing opportunities and am ready to demonstrate my skills during the interview process. Thank you for your time and attention to my resume.

about.title: About me
about.caption: Curious about me? Here you have it:
about.text1: I am a front-end developer with commercial experience in creating web applications. My passion for programming and optimizing user interfaces helps me achieve high results in my work.
about.text2: In my work, I actively use modern technologies and frameworks such as TypeScript, Next.js, React and Tailwind CSS. This allows me to create effective and attractive interfaces for users.
about.text3: I am currently actively looking for a job and looking to find a team where I can apply my skills and develop further.
about.text4: I am open to discussing opportunities and am willing to demonstrate my skills during the interview process. I am confident that I can make a valuable contribution to your team.
about.text5: Thank you for your time and attention to my resume. I look forward to the opportunity to collaborate and am ready for new challenges in the world of web development.

skills.title: Skills
skills.descr: The skills, tools and technologies I am really good at:

experience.title: Experience
experience.descr: Here is a quick summary of my most recent experiences:

card1.caption: Frontend developer
card1.point1: Applied algorithms and methodologies to address key performance issues, resulting in smoother system operation,
card1.point2: Developed a number of additional modules, such as data analysis systems, which significantly expanded the functionality of the CRM system and contributed to the growth of customer satisfaction,

card2.caption: Frontend developer
card2.point1: Development of user interface with responsive design and support for various devices (mobile and desktop versions).
card2.point2: Conducting performance analysis, implementing caching techniques, lazy loading and other practices to improve the loading time and response of the application.
card2.point3: Writing unit and integration tests using Jest, which ensured the reliability and stability of the application.

card3.caption: Frontend developer
card3.point1: Implementation of functionality for online booking of services, including schedule management, client notifications and the ability to change the booking.
card3.point2: Implementation of a system of reviews and ratings for services and salons, allowing users to leave feedback and evaluate the quality of services provided.
card3.point3: Implementation of an interface for administrators, allowing to manage services, prices and stocks, as well as add new services and promotions

projects.title: Projects
projects.descr: Some of the noteworthy projects I have built:

card1.caption: CV website
card1.descr: To showcase personal skills and experience, and to offer potential employers and clients a convenient way to learn about projects and opportunities.

card3.caption: Anime List
card3.descr: In development. A site with partial implementation of the functionality of the MyAnimeList site

contact.title: Contacts
contact.text: What’s next? Feel free to reach out to me if youre looking for a developer, have a query, or simply want to connect.
contact.descr: You may also find me on these platforms!

feedback.feedbackButton: Or you can fill out the feedback form and I will contact you
feedback.name: Name
feedback.agreement: I hereby agree to the Terms of processing of my personal data.
